code: @Bean RouteBuilder routeBuilder() {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:foo").to("stub:foo?password={{mypassword}}").         }     }. }
@Test public void shouldSecret() throws InterruptedException {     Object endpoint = camelContext.hasEndpoint("stub:foo?password=1234").     assertNotNull(endpoint). }
